text: No officer or member of the Metropolitan Police force or of the Fire Department of the District of Columbia shall, by reason of the enactment of § 5-1302, be:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 4-1103.

1973 Ed., § 4-903.

DC CODE § 5-1303

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Reduced in rank or grade; or
Entitled to any compensation for any period prior to July 1, 1947.

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Service in Armed Forces--Rank or grade preserved; restriction on compensation.
